mapper.select: SELECT memo_id, reg_date, user_id, title, memo_content, upd_id, upd_dt, reg_id, reg_dt FROM tb_memo WHERE reg_date between #{startDate}::date and #{endDate}::date ORDER BY memo_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_memo( user_id, reg_date, title, memo_content, upd_id, upd_dt, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{regDate}::date, #{title}, #{memoContent}, #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now() );
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMO SET title = #{title}, memo_content = #{memoContent}, upd_id = #{userId}, upd_dt = now() WHERE memo_id = #{memoId} ;
